message_1: What is the plaintext message obtained by decrypting the Caesar cipher "KHOOR ZRUOG" using a key of 3?
message_2:
To decrypt a Caesar cipher with a key of 3, we shift each letter in the ciphertext 3 positions back in the alphabet. 

K -> H
H -> E
O -> L
O -> L
R -> O
(space remains the same)
Z -> W
R -> O
U -> R
O -> L
G -> D

The decrypted plaintext message is "HELLO WORLD".
